name: Jumpity Jump
description:
This is the first video game I ever make! Is my entry on the Untitled Game Jam #32

There is no much backstroy about the game, the theme was "Upside down", it was very dificult for me not to do something very common, this is funny as I was the person that recomended the theme :{ 

The game was so much fun to do, and I learned a lot!
